# Carapace llms.txt

Project: Carapace
Summary: Desktop control layer for AI-assisted workflows with human oversight and explicit runtime controls.
Status: Early-stage, experimental, security hardening in progress.

Canonical URLs
- Website: https://carapaceai.org
- GitHub org: https://github.com/CarapaceUDE
- Main repo: https://github.com/CarapaceUDE/carapace
- Releases: https://github.com/CarapaceUDE/carapace/releases

Safety notes
- Not production-safe yet.
- Use in controlled/test environments.
- Keep human review in the loop.
